title: [BETA] Hybrid Query
description: Hybrid of Vector and Lexical Search. Will be skipped if query string is blank or wildcard (* or *:*).  Note this will not work well if the incoming q parameter is a Solr query parser string (e.g. field_t:foo) rather than a raw user query string.  Note: The resulting query will ALWAYS be written to <request.params.q>.

skip.title: Skip This Stage
skip.description: Set to true to skip this stage.

label.title: Label
label.description: A unique label for this stage.

condition.title: Condition
condition.description: Define a conditional script that must result in true or false. This can be used to determine if the stage should process or not.

legacy.title: Legacy
legacy.description: True if this stage only supports legacy mode

lexicalQuery.title: Lexical Query
lexicalQuery.description: Lexical query to use as input to the hybrid search.

lexicalWeight.title: Lexical Query Weight
lexicalWeight.description: Relative weight of the lexical query.

lexicalDepth.title: Number of Lexical Results
lexicalDepth.description: The number of lexical search results to include in re-ranking.

vectorQueryField.title: Vector Query Field
vectorQueryField.description: The name of the Solr field for knn vector search.

vectorContextVariable.title: Vector Context Variable
vectorContextVariable.description: Context variable which contains the vector resulting from a previous stage, such as the Vectorize Query via Lucidworks AI stage.

vectorWeight.title: Vector Query Weight
vectorWeight.description: Relative weight of the vector query.

vectorDepth.title: Number of Vector Results
vectorDepth.description: The number of vector search results to include in re-ranking.  Also known as topK.
